edu.arizona.ece.memsim.model

Class CacheController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.arizona.ece.memsim.model.CacheController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheCallBack, WriteInvalidateListener

    public class CacheController
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheCallBack, WriteInvalidateListener
    Models L1-Ln Cache Memory
    Author:
    Mike Harmon (mpharmo@email.arizona.edu)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheController

        public CacheController(java.lang.Integer level,
                       java.lang.Integer tSize,
                       java.lang.Integer bSize,
                       java.lang.Integer assoc,
                       java.lang.Integer aTime,
                       CacheController pCache)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a Model CacheController with a Parent CacheController
        Parameters:
        level - Cache Level (1-n)
        tSize - Total Size of the Cache
        bSize - Block Size of the Cache
        assoc - Associativity of the Cache
        aTime - Access Time of the Cache
        pCache - Parent Cache (for 1 to n-1 Caches)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If pCache is NULL

      • CacheController

        public CacheController(java.lang.Integer level,
                       java.lang.Integer tSize,
                       java.lang.Integer bSize,
                       java.lang.Integer assoc,
                       java.lang.Integer aTime,
                       Memory pMemory)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a Model Cache with a Parent Memory
        Parameters:
        level - Cache Level (1-n)
        tSize - Total Size of the Cache
        bSize - Block Size of the Cache
        assoc - Associativity of the Cache
        aTime - Access Time of the Cache
        pMemory - Parent Memory (for top level Cache)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
